text:
I have this code:

<copy todir="${TARGET_PATH_ROOT}">
 <fileset dir="${SOURCE_PATH_ROOT}">
   <includesfile name="aFile.txt"/>
 </fileset>
</copy>

Now the includesfile doesn't take the Source Path, but the Target Path. So it
looks for the file
${TARGET_PATH_ROOT}/aFile.txt

The same goes for a Zipfileset.
creator: spybreak@gmx.net
antoine@apache.org
text:
no, the include files are resolved (like most files in ant tasks) relative to 
the project directory.
May be TARGET_PATH_ROOT is also the project directory.
